question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
answer: Kota Bogor, Indonesia is known as the "City of Rain" because it experiences frequent and heavy rainfall throughout the year.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor, Indonesia is known as the "City of Rain" because it experiences frequent and heavy rainfall throughout the year.
